turns.text: I work for university and I went to uh Omaha Nebraska to recruit students and I had some time off in the afternoon so I went to pet shop and I saw these little Springer Spaniels --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Um

-- and so I decided well you know this would really be nice dog to have so when I got back home to Carney Nebraska I told my wife about it and I said You know this is just - I I I can just hear the dog crying for me now

turns.text: And Christmas is coming up hint hint and so I had to go back the next week as well as bunch of other people from the university and one of the people uh that we went with uh they were friends of ours and so we got to Omaha and I decided Id take my friend over and show him the dog and so I got over there and she said Oh thats too bad the dog has already been sold And I didnt realize it but this guy had somehow worked it out so that he got there little bit earlier bought the dog and she was in the back room and so that night we had reception for some of the uh potential high school students or college students and and uh he had the dog the whole time in his room and and I had no idea And so we headed back to Carney that night and the dog rode in the car and we stopped along the way and had bite to eat and they left the dog in the car and I guess while we were inside eating Thumper just tore the heck out of the inside of the car and uh finally we made it back to uh to Carney and -
